item.title: 4 YouTube Resources to Get Started with Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes (K8s) is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. It groups containers that make up an application into logical units for easy management and discovery. Kubernetes official website Reading the definition from Kubernetes official website it becomes clear why people often feel frustrated starting to learn this technology. Today, I prepared a list of YouTube videos that will help you to learn Kubernetes and its architecture incrementally!
